# bundle

**Instance Property**

The bundle containing the resource.

## Declaration

```swift
let bundle: Bundle
```

## Accessing resource properties

- **name**: The name of the resource in the bundle.
- **subdirectory**: The subdirectory, if any, of the resource.
- **locale**: The bundle containing the resource.

items.description: The name of the resource in the bundle.
items.name: name

items.description: The subdirectory, if any, of the resource.
